channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16262] Update RegionsInTransition UI for branch-1
item.description: Backport HBASE-13839 to Branch 1. Also make a few style changes in the code.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Tested locally on Branch-1 by failing openRegion commands and checking out the UI. Appears to have the same behavior as Master's RegionInTransition UI.

-1 overall
